title: Roosevelt Montás on Rescuing Socrates
description: How do books change our lives? Educator and author Roosevelt Montás of Columbia University talks about his book Rescuing Socrates with EconTalk host Russ Roberts. Drawing on his own educational and life journey, Montás shows how great books don't just teach us stuff--they get inside us and make us who we are.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (EconTalk: Russ Roberts)
